articles.author: Kyle Morris
articles.title: Psaki defends not allowing charter flights from Afghanistan to land at US bases - Fox News
articles.description: White House press secretary Jen Psaki said Wednesday during a briefing that President Biden's administration is "not going to allow" charter flights with unvetted passengers from Afghanistan to land on American military bases, due to safety concerns.

articles.title: Fridge-free Covid vaccines developed using viruses from plants, bacteria - Deccan Herald
